resources.string: El inicio de sesión HSDP no está disponible

[es-MX]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[es-MX]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[es-MX]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[es-MX]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[es-MX]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[es-MX]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[es-MX]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[es-MX]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[es-MX]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[es-MX]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[es-MX]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[es-MX]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[es-MX]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[es-MX]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[es-MX]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[es-MX]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[es-MX]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[es-MX]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[es-MX]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[es-MX]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[es-MX]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[es-MX]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[es-MX]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[es-MX]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[es-MX]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[es-MX]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[es-MX]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[es-MX]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[es-MX]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[es-MX]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[es-MX]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[es-MX]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
El campo de datos está vacío o no es válido
El texto grande específico para la proposición va en el contenido
El título específico para la proposición va aquí
Ingresó o seleccionó valores de parámetro no válidos. Seleccione los valores de los parámetros apropiados e inicie de nuevo
[es-MX]I allow Philips to store binary data
[es-MX]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[es-MX]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[es-MX]The actual content of the binary consent help text here

Doy mi autorización para que Philips recopile mis datos de aplicación con el fin de que la aplicación funcione de mejor manera, se personalice, se integre con las redes sociales y muestre contenido y publicidad pertinentes.

Aviso de cookies

Esta aplicación utiliza Adobe Analytics, un servicio de análisis (“Adobe Analytics”) proporcionado por Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (“Adobe”). Este servicio utiliza “cookies” u otras técnicas similares, que corresponden a archivos de texto integrados en la aplicación, con el fin de que la aplicación analice patrones de tráfico generales mediante nuestra aplicación. A través de la transmisión de información generada por la cookie con respecto al uso de la aplicación a Adobe, la configuración garantiza que la dirección IP se anonimice antes de la geolocalización y se reemplazará por una dirección IP genérica antes del almacenamiento. Adobe, en nombre de Philips, utilizará esta información para evaluar tu uso de la aplicación y generará informes sobre la actividad de la aplicación para Philips con el fin de proporcionar otros servicios relacionados con la actividad y el uso de la aplicación a Philips. Adobe no asociará tu dirección IP con ningún otro dato administrado por Adobe. Puedes evitar que Adobe y Philips recopilen y usen datos (cookies y dirección IP) si dejas de participar después de cerrar esta pantalla.
[es-MX]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

Tras otorgar tu autorización, es posible que las empresas del grupo Philips se comuniquen contigo para enviarte comunicaciones promocionales a través de correo electrónico, SMS y otros medios digitales, tales como aplicaciones móviles y redes sociales. Para personalizar las comunicaciones según tus preferencias y comportamiento, y ofrecerte la mejor experiencia personalizada, es posible que analicemos y combinemos tus datos personales. Entre estos datos se pueden incluir los siguientes: 

Los datos que nos entregaste
Los datos que desees compartir activamente con nosotros, como tu nombre, fecha de nacimiento o edad, dirección de correo electrónico, dirección postal, país, sexo, número de teléfono o perfil en medios sociales.

Los datos que obtenemos de tus interacciones con Philips
Los datos acerca de tus interacciones y el uso de los canales digitales de Philips, tales como redes sociales, sitios web, correos electrónicos, aplicaciones y productos conectados. Entre estos datos se pueden incluir los siguientes: dirección IP, cookies, información de dispositivos, comunicaciones en las que debe hacer clic, detalles de ubicaciones y sitios web que visites

Philips te da la oportunidad de retirar tu consentimiento en cualquier momento.
Para obtener más información, consulta el aviso de privacidad y el aviso de cookies de Philips.
[es-MX]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[es-MX]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[es-MX]I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
[es-MX]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes

[es-MX]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[es-MX]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[es-MX]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
